author: Staff Reporter
text:
Superintendent of Police, Tiruvannamalai district, R. Ponni has released a toll free number to contact police regarding election related complaints.

In a release, she asked people of Tiruvannamalai district to contact the toll free number: 18004257011 in case they were threatened, forced to vote for a particular person or party or other election related complaints.

She also asked people to take note of a non-toll free number: 04175-232346 for the same purpose.
title: Toll-free number for poll complaints
